mexsolve.simplex.simplex_networks.create_matrix¶

mexsolve.simplex.simplex_networks.create_matrix(variables, constraints)[source]¶

Creates a matrix with enough rows for each constraint plus the objective function and enough columns for all the variables. :param - variables: number of variables :type - variables: int :param - constraints: number of constraints :type - constraints: int

Returns

  • matrix (numpy array)
